title: Galagedara CC take on Indian lawyers
content:
The article below represents a preview only and is not meant for reuse or republishing. 
Sri Lanka, Sept. 23 -- A lawyers cricket team from Hyderabad India will arrive Sri Lanka on September 23 and will play few friendly matches. 
In the same afternoon they will take on Galagedara Cricket Club at Galagedara. This is the first instance that a foreign team playing at Galagedara grounds. This match is organizaed by their coach L A Sampath and the two teams will be captained by Sunil Goud and Mahesh Boghalanda respectively....
